sentence: Westerman has suggested that the existing special use permit sets  a fair market value that is just so prohibitive that none of these  landings will ever happen in marine sanctuaries.

Speaker, sinkholes pose a significant problem for Florida and  many States, yet we don't have a comprehensive mapping system to help  first responders and community planners, as was mentioned by our  chairman, Chairman Westerman.

I also  thank Chairman Westerman for his support and his team and his staff for  giving us the opportunity here to consider a number of bills that are  bipartisan, common sense, and certainly mean a lot to the folks who I  represent out West.
I also thank Chairman  Westerman and Ranking Member Huffman for their support.

Speaker, I extend my thanks to Chairman Westerman  and Ranking Member Huffman for their support in advancing my bipartisan  legislation, Fire Safe Electrical Corridors Act, which I introduced  with Representatives Valadao, Costa, and Fitzpatrick.
Speaker, I do want to thank Chair Westerman for his support of  the Fix Our Forests Act, introducing that bill, and I hope that it does  make it to the Senate.
I thank Chairman Westerman and Subcommittee Chairman Hurd for their  partnership in bringing this important legislation to the floor.
